root.name: Nippon Daihyou Team: Eikou no Eleven
root.description: OverviewReleased almost three weeks before the start of the 1998 FIFA World Cup. Features the Japan national football team. Play the Qualification and finally the World Cup!This game is nearly identical to the J-League Big Wave Soccer.

similar_games.game: J-League Fighting Soccer: The King of Ace Strikers
